channel.title: Custom Model Replacements
channel.description: So, I'm replacing models for the old Half-Life 1, right? Well, in Half-Life one, when I add all the required files in their appropriate folders (steamapps/half-life/valve/models and steamapps/half-life/valve/sounds/weapons) I can only replace the sounds. Also, when I replaced weapons in the folder for the mod Azure Sheep, only the world-models and sounds changed, the view-models stayed the same. I've thought that the .gcf file for Half-Life overrides any folder-based files. So, help please. :slight_smile:
